title: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
description: The datetime values retrieved from a table are displayed in different formats in a dynamic text item and a data/text item.
OB: When retrieving datetime values from a table, the format displayed in the dynamic text item and the data/text item is different.
EB: The datetime values retrieved from the table should be displayed in the same format in both the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Retrieve datetime values from a table in a dynamic text item and a data/text item.
2. Compare the format of the datetime values displayed in both items and note the difference.
